pkgmetadata.longdescription: # CLIP-JAXThis repository is used to CLIP models from ðŸ¤— transformers using JAX.## Installation```bashpip install -e .```## Usage1. Use [dataset/prepare_dataset.ipynb](dataset/prepare_dataset.ipynb) to prepare your dataset.1. Train the model with [training/train_clip.py](training/train_clip.py).## Supported downstream tasks- [x] Image classification with `FlaxCLIPVisionModelForImageClassification`## TODO- [ ] Add guides- [ ] Add pre-trained models- [ ] Add more downstream tasks
